oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Welche Kompetenzen befähigen zur landwirtschaftlichen Diversifizierung?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Braun, Charis Linda
Specht, Judith
Wenz, Katrin
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Education, extension and communication
Knowledge management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Agricultural diversification might be an answer to structural change in farming and demographic change in rural areas. Findings from empirical research highlight specific competences that enable farmers to successfully implement diversification strategies such as direct sales, social farming, or agro tourism. The identified competences are categorized as professional and personal competences based on the taxonomy of the National Qualifications Framework for Germany. The findings could serve as a guideline for designing courses that enable farmers to implement diversification strategies.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Braun, Charis Linda; Specht, Judith and Wenz, Katrin (2014) Welche Kompetenzen befähigen zur landwirtschaftlichen Diversifizierung? Paper at: 13. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Hochschule für nachhaltige Entwicklung Eberswalde, 17. - 20. März 2015.
